blogPost.excerpt: Want to grow your startup? GrowthHackAI is a GPT-3 powered tool that will help you find the perfect growth strategies that will take your business to the next level. 100% Free. No Signup Required.
blogPost.body: Want to grow your startup? GrowthHackAI is a GPT-3 powered tool that will help you find the perfect growth strategies that will take your business to the next level. 100% Free. No Signup Required.
blogPost.title: Growth Hack AI - Free GPT-3 powered growth strategies to boost your startup
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 想让你的初创企业成长？GrowthHackAI是一款由GPT-3驱动的工具，它将帮助你找到完美的增长策略，使你的业务更上一层楼。100%免费。无需注册。
localize.tagline: 免费的GPT-3驱动的增长策略来促进你的创业公司

localize.description: 想讓你的初創企業成長？GrowthHackAI是一款由GPT-3驅動的工具，它將幫助你找到完美的增長策略，使你的業務更上一層樓。100%免費。無需註冊。
localize.tagline: 免費的GPT-3驅動的增長策略來促進你的創業公司

previous.excerpt: Firefox Relay makes it easy to create aliases, randomly generated email addresses that forward to your real inbox. Use it to protect your online accounts - and your identity - from hackers.
previous.title: Firefox Relay - Hide your real email address to help protect your identity.

localize.description: Firefox Relay 可以轻松创建别名，即随机生成的电子邮件地址，并转发到您的真实收件箱。使用它来保护你的在线账户和你的身份，防止黑客入侵。
localize.tagline: 隐藏您的真实电子邮件地址，以帮助保护您的身份。

localize.description: Firefox Relay 可以輕鬆創建別名，即隨機生成的電子郵件地址，並轉發到您的真實收件箱。使用它來保護你的在線賬戶和你的身份，防止黑客入侵。
localize.tagline: 隱藏您的真實電子郵件地址，以幫助保護您的身份。

next.excerpt: Handoff Helpers is a free component library that helps you effectively communicate your designs 💪 —— It includes components like: - Prototype Table of Contents - Link trees - To-do lists - All kinds of organizers - Status indicators - and more!
next.title: Handoff Helpers - Free Figma library to make designers better communicators

localize.description: Handoff Helpers是一个免费的组件库，可以帮助你有效地沟通你的设计💪 --它包括的组件有。- 原型目录--链接树--待办事项列表--各种组织者--状态指示器--等等!
localize.tagline: 免费的Figma库让设计师成为更好的沟通者

localize.description: Handoff Helpers是一個免費的組件庫，可以幫助你有效地溝通你的設計💪 --它包括的組件有。- 原型目錄--鏈接樹--待辦事項列表--各種組織者--狀態指示器--等等!
